title: Was the "pinadry challenge" warning too fast about the risk of overdoses?
subtitle: The challenge of the Internet, which spread in 2020, has joined a long list of serious challenges that have targeted adolescents on social media.
author: Madison Dapcevich
vclaim: The so-called Benadryl Challenge became viral in Teek Tok in 2020, challenging adolescents with an overdose of sensitive drugs to obtain hallucinations, leading to warnings from medical experts about the potential risk of overdose death.
